text: François Gayot de Pitaval (1673–1743) was a French advocate. He compiled a famous collection of causes célèbres. Later the literary genre of true crime collections became known as Pitaval. == Works == * Causes célèbres et intéressantes, avec les jugemens qui les ont décidées (1734-1741 in 18 volumes) Category:French lawyers Category:1673 births Category:1743 deaths
title: François Gayot de Pitaval
